title: Steve Kerr - Wikipedia
snippet: Stephen Douglas Kerr (born September 27, 1965) is an American professional basketball coach and former player, broadcaster, commentator and executive, who is the head coach for the Golden State Warriors of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He was the head coach of the U.S. national team.

title: Steve Kerr Bio | The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association
snippet: Steve Kerr is the Head Coach of the Golden State Warriors. On May 19, 2014, Kerr became the 25th Head Coach in Warriors history.

title: Head Coach, Golden State Warriors, National Basketball Association | Aspen Ideas
snippet: Steve Kerr is head coach of the NBA’s Golden State Warriors, since 2014. In eleven seasons, he has guided the basketball team to four NBA championships and six NBA finals appearances, among other achievements.
